chapter.title: Policy Agent Fixes, Limitations, & Known Issues
chapter.para: OpenAM policy agent issues are tracked at https://bugster.forgerock.org/jira/browse/OPENAM.

section.title: Web Policy Agents
section.para: This section covers the status of key issues and limitations at release .

section.title: Fixes Since Last Release
section.para: The following issues were fixed in this release.

listitem.para: OPENAM-1448: IIS6 policy agent returns http 415 error when used with SOAP web-services and custom headers
OPENAM-1420: http HEAD request gets transformed into GET
OPENAM-1419: Provider configuration message is garbled when using DBCS languages
OPENAM-1392: Password reset service does not work when using DBCS languages
OPENAM-1386: Password reset form is garbled when using DBCS languages
OPENAM-1357: WebSphere Policy Agent authentication issue for syncNode script when OpenAM authentication chain updated to not use Datastore as first module.
OPENAM-1344: Wrong library being loaded by apache 2.4 policy agent
OPENAM-1339: Empty audit log message for windows policy agents
OPENAM-1271: webagent namingUrl validation fails if datastore auth module is not configured within auth-chain of agent realm
OPENAM-1270: Web policy agent/sdk needs an option to disable extended OpenAM naming URL validation during bootstrap
OPENAM-1267: WebAgent installer shows 'OpenSSO Policy Agent' at welcome screen
OPENAM-1264: OpenAM Web Agent crashes while cleaning Agent Config
OPENAM-1220: Invalid date header -1 with Java agents
OPENAM-1208: IIS6 policy agent sticks in a loop on a session refresh advice
OPENAM-1190: IIS6 policy agent erroneously overwrites http headers

section.title: Limitations
section.para: OpenAM web policy agents do not currently support IPv6.
